name: Keep Me Alive (PriomDeb)
description:
Hi, I am Priom Deb. I developed this game for The GameDev.tv Game Jam 2022 - Free Course For All Submissions!

This game is inspired from Asteroid Avoider, one of the game from GameDev.tv's course, Unity Mobile C# Developer Course.

Gameplay Instruction: Just hover your mouse to control player and stay away from those dirty enemy drones! Here in this game, death is only the beginning!

The background audio track is also composed by me!

https://github.com/PriomDeb/Keep-Me-Safe
